tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP$ My) (NN heart) (CC and) (NN mind)) (VP (VBP are) (PP (IN with) (NP (NP (PRP you)) (, ,) (NP (NNP Virginia) (NNP Tech))))) (. .)))
